INSERT INTO c VALUES (#{cno},#{tno},#{cname},#{credit},#{cdept});
查询未选的课程信息<-->
SELECT cno,cname,credit,cdept,tname FROM c INNER JOIN t t2 on c.tno = t2.tno WHERE cno NOT IN (SELECT cno FROM sc WHERE sno=#{sno})
查询已选无成绩的课程<-->
SELECT sc.cno,cname,credit,cdept,tname FROM sc INNER JOIN c c2 on sc.cno = c2.cno INNER JOIN t t2 on c2.tno = t2.tno WHERE sno=#{sno} AND grade IS NULL
查询有成绩的课程<-->
SELECT sc.cno,cname,grade,point FROM sc INNER JOIN c c2 on sc.cno = c2.cno WHERE sno=#{sno} AND grade IS NOT NULL
